content:
Hi there,
I would like to delete attachments older than 1 year for example.

Do I have to only delete them on file system or something else to do in database ?

Thanks !
This topic was moved here from #issues > Delete old attachment by Alya Abbott.
@Unam see https://zulip.com/help/message-retention-policy. We don't currently have a feature to just delete the attachments, and not also the messages of that age.
